name: OnGraph Technologies Corporation
tagline: RoR, AWS Cloud, Blockchain and Alexa Experts
description:
Founded in 2007, OnGraph is a global software development companyÂ headquartered in Noida, India. Since our establishment, we have brought custom software products to clients coming from small, mid-sized and large companies. Currently, we have rendered quality web and mobile development services to companies engaged in varied markets like health care, banking & finance, eCommerce, education, telecom, media & entertainment, and more.
Our team of diverse IT professionals consists of highly skilled software developers, testers and project managers. They have enabled us to effectively handle software projects of any scale and complexity. As part of this journey, we have made our presence in a different part of the globe. OnGraph has been successful in providing the environment where a diverse team shares technological expertise and applies their competencies to contribute to the company's capacity to meet the client's specific needs.
Industry Recognition
OnGraph has been recognized several times for its creative and quality work in web and mobile application developments. Some of the highlights are below:
Member of NASSCOM
Recognized by Siliconindia as Top 100 Mobile Apps Vendors India 2013
Won the SiliconIndia Best Mobile App 2012 award for AirGol app
Won the SiliconIndia Best Startup Award for 2012
airgol.com selected as one of top 150 startups for websummit in Dublin, Ireland
